item.title: Learning Malayalam – by Soni Somarajan
item.description: Learning Malayalam Manjadithara, Puthupally, 1982 അ On the layer of sand that my forefinger parts, the curvaceous overture begins to reveal an elephant in a line drawing. I taste succulent jungle grass. Say, if I held the shell of the first alphabet close to my ear, would it be a tribute to the mammal’s memory— something I need to embark on a journey of language? ഋ In innocence, I saw only
